description: Enhanced FAO food data with food_supply_kcal integration

usage.timeseries: Use for line charts - now includes food_supply_kcal values
usage.rankings: Use for bar charts showing top producers

notes.food_supply_kcal: Added from original FAO dataset, represents actual food consumption
notes.preservation: All existing metrics (production, imports, exports, domestic_supply, feed) preserved
notes.backup: Original timeseries.json backed up as timeseries_backup.json
